Uses of Package
cams.view.base

Packages that use cams.view.base
Package
Description
cams.view
A group of user interface elements.
cams.view.base
A group of base user interface elements which are extended to create more specific user interface components.
cams.view.components
A group of specific user interface components which extends from the cams.view.base package.
cams.view.components.auth
A group of user interface used to get inputs for user authentication and changing user password.
cams.view.components.camp
A group of user interface components specific to the camp functionality.
cams.view.components.repliable
A group of user interface menus Users can use to interact with Repliable objects.
cams.view.components.staff
A group of user interface menus accessible by Staff.
cams.view.components.student
A group of user interface menus accessible by Students.
  • Classes in cams.view.base used by cams.view
    Class
    Description
    Displayable
    Interface for displaying all user interface elements.
  • Classes in cams.view.base used by cams.view.base
    Class
    Description
    ActionableItem
    Base class for user interface elements with distinct actions.
    Alert
    Base class for all dismissible pop-up user interface elements.
    Displayable
    Interface for displaying all user interface elements.
    ItemAction
    Interface for actions of user interface elements.
    TextBox
    Base class for user interface elements which requests user input.
  • Classes in cams.view.base used by cams.view.components
    Class
    Description
    Displayable
    Interface for displaying all user interface elements.
    SelectionMenu
    Base class for all user interface elements with actionable selections.
  • Classes in cams.view.base used by cams.view.components.auth
    Class
    Description
    ActionableItem
    Base class for user interface elements with distinct actions.
    Alert
    Base class for all dismissible pop-up user interface elements.
    Displayable
    Interface for displaying all user interface elements.
    Form
    Base class for all user interface elements which requires user input and runs an action after retrieving them.
